module.name: procedural_shape_model
module.keywords: module, solid, construction history, procedural, modified.
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the procedural modification of shape models. Detailed definitions of the types of modification supported are defined in other modules which reference this module.

inscope.li: procedural models defined by their construction history;
relationships between procedural and explicit representations of the same shape model;
relationships between procedural and explicit representations of the same shape elements;

outscope.li: the definition of individual shape modification operations.

uof.name: Procedural_shape_model
uof.description: The Procedural_shape_model UoF specifies the data structure for the high level description of operations to modify shape models by local shape operations. The basic modification operations are defined in the application modules which reference this module. This module provides a mechanism for associating a base shape model with the shape model resulting from the application of a shape modification operation. It also provides for the definition of a sequence of modification operations and the association of this sequence with of an explicit shape model produced by applying the operations.
